Plot: The tale of an outlaw who escapes from prison and sets out across the Texas hills to reunite with his wife and the daughter he has never met.
Title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
Actors: Rooney Mara, Casey Affleck, Ben Foster, Keith Carradine
tomatoConsensus: While conventional in plot, Ain't Them Bodies Saints is a visually poetic film that pays homage to the New Hollywood directors of the 1970s and promises big things from director David Lowery.
